mapper.select: SELECT PARAM_CODE AS PARAMCODE , PARAM_TYPE AS PARAMTYPE, PARAM_NAME AS PARAMNAME, PARAM_VALUE1 AS PARAMVALUE1, PARAM_VALUE2 AS PARAMVALUE2, MEMO FROM TB_SYS_PARAM WHERE PARAM_TYPE = #{paramType} order by PARAM_CODE

SELECT L.CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID AS LEVELID, L.CUSTOMER_LEVEL_NAME AS LEVELNAME FROM TB_CUST_LEVEL L INNER JOIN TB_CUST_LEVEL_RULE R ON L.CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID = R.CUSTOMER_LEVEL_ID WHERE R.STATUS = '1' ORDER BY R.GROW_VAL_BEGIN_VAL
SELECT A.AWARD_LEVEL as AWARD_LEVEL, A.AWARD_LEVEL_NAME as AWARD_LEVEL_NAME FROM TB_MKT_AWARD_LEVEL A WHERE A.AWARD_LEVEL != 0 ORDER BY A.AWARD_LEVEL
SELECT APP_ID APPID, APP_NAME APPNAME FROM TB_SYS_APP

SELECT BRANCH_ID BRANCHID, BRANCH_NAME BRANCHNAME FROM TB_SYS_BRANCH WHERE 1=1
AND APP_ID in (${appId})
